example.text: You're not "unmasking" anyone. The answer is no, we're not okay with Democrats trying to raise taxes. We're in this spiraling debt crisis because of reckless spending. So let's deal with that first, before you guys try to push higher taxes on the American people. [[url]]

That's a starting point for negotiations; Congress can certainly debate the appropriate number of terms. I believe this issue is important because, while there is some value in having years of experience in Congress, it is too easy to become disconnected and entrenched the longer someone serves in Washington.
THANK YOU to these 43 Senators for supporting our plan to get America back on track. [[url]]
“Transition Care” Such a quaint term to refer to surgeries, chemicals, hormones, puberty blockers, mastectomies, etc... ON CHILDREN. [[url]]

You're not "unmasking" anyone. The answer is no, we're not okay with Democrats trying to raise taxes. We're in this spiraling debt crisis because of reckless spending. So let's deal with that first, before you guys try to push higher taxes on the American people. [[url]]

On a related note, as your representative in Congress, I have many concerns and questions about President Biden's handling of this situation. This is a matter of national security that should receive a high degree of congressional scrutiny in the coming weeks.
Meanwhile, if you have questions about legislation or my votes in Congress, my office in Washington, DC can answer those. You can reach my DC office at (202) 225-5501.
